thread.title: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner
thread.title_full: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner - San Antonio Express-News

author: Andrea Waguespack, Houston Chronicle
title: John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner
text:
Image 1 of / 125 125
John Goodman attends the Accenture Gala Screening of 'Trumbo' during the BFI London Film Festival at Odeon Leicester Square on October 8, 2015 in London, England. (Photo by )
John Goodman attends the Accenture Gala Screening of 'Trumbo'...
Image 2 of 125 Helen Mirren, Bryan Cranston and John Goodman attend attend a screening of "Trumbo" during the BFI London Film Festival at Odeon Leicester Square on October 8, 2015 in London, England. (Photo by Mike Marsland/WireImage)
Photo: WireImage Helen Mirren, Bryan Cranston and John Goodman attend attend a... Image 3 of 125 John Goodman attends a screening of "Trumbo" during the BFI London Film Festival at Odeon Leicester Square on October 8, 2015 in London, England. (Photo by Mike Marsland/WireImage)
Photo: WireImage John Goodman attends a screening of "Trumbo" during the BFI London... Image 4 of 125 Singer Miley Cyrus did not always look to shock fans with wild looks.
Photo: Jon Kopaloff, Getty Images Singer Miley Cyrus did not always look to shock fans with wild looks. Image 5 of 125 January Jones
Back in 2005 when the cruelness that is Betty Draper was just a glimmer in Matthew Weiner's eye, January Jones sported a soft and sweet style. Her layered waves and glowing skin at the Toronto Film Festival said easy beach babe not Mad woman.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images January Jones
Back in 2005 when the cruelness that is Betty Draper...
Image 6 of 125 January Jones
Five seasons of Mad Men later, January has ditched her girlish ways for a more sophisticated style. Her sleek side part and angular long bob at the Metropolitan Museum of Art's Costume Institute Gala in 2012, give her a modern edge that sets her apart from her retro character.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images January Jones
Five seasons of Mad Men later, January has ditched...
Image 7 of 125 Zoe Kravitz
As the lone offspring of Lenny Kravitz and Lisa Bonet, Zoe is guaranteed to be a member of the cool crowd. At a screening of The Mysteries of Pittsburgh in 2009 she showed off her hipster status with thick, rounded bangs and cherry red lips.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Zoe Kravitz
As the lone offspring of Lenny Kravitz and Lisa Bonet,...
Image 8 of 125 Zoe Kravitz
Zoe takes a less dramatic approach at an event in 2012, wearing a delicate lace frock, soft pink makeup, with loose tendrils of hair framing her face. She still oozes coolness, but her new toned-down look lets her really show off those good genes.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Zoe Kravitz
Zoe takes a less dramatic approach at an event in 2012,...
Image 9 of 125 Rachel McAdams
Flipped out, half-up, half-down hair and natural makeup give this Notebook star a prim and pretty sorority girl style at a press conference for The Family Stone in 2005.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Rachel McAdams
Flipped out, half-up, half-down hair and natural...
Image 10 of 125 Rachel McAdams
Rachel upgraded to vamp for the premiere of The Vow in 2012. She’s got an of-the-moment edge with thick bangs and dark eye liner—not to mention the swipe of red lipstick that takes her to the level of major Hollywood star.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Rachel McAdams
Rachel upgraded to vamp for the premiere of The Vow ...
Image 11 of 125 Kelly Clarkson
Just after her big American Idol win in 2002, Kelly Clarkson still looks like an average college girl with blonde-streaked, shoulder-length hair, and glossy lips.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Kelly Clarkson
Just after her big American Idol win in 2002, Kelly...
Image 12 of 125 Kelly Clarkson
Now she is owning her much-deserved star power with golden blonde locks, choppy bangs and a stand-out sequin top at the Capital FM Summertime Ball in June 2012.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Kelly Clarkson
Now she is owning her much-deserved star power with... Image 13 of 125 Raven Symoné
With her bedazzled top, Hello Kitty necklace, curly hair, and pink eye shadow, Raven didn't subscribe to the "less is more" theory at the Kids Choice Awards in 2008.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Raven Symoné
With her bedazzled top, Hello Kitty necklace, curly...
Image 14 of 125 Raven Symoné
By the Race to Erase MS event in 2011, Raven had learned to take it down to the core beauty basics: glowing skin, sleek makeup and shiny hair.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Raven Symoné
By the Race to Erase MS event in 2011, Raven had...
Image 15 of 125 Amanda Seyfried
Amanda was every bit the girl next door back in 2008. Her extra-long locks and subtle lip color make her-oh-so approachable at the premiere of her breakout film Mamma Mia .
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Amanda Seyfried
Amanda was every bit the girl next door back in...
Image 16 of 125 Amanda Seyfried
Amanda's gone from sweet to sultry in just a few years: At the 2012 premiere of Gone she dons seductive smoky eye makeup and voluminous curls. An Old Hollywood aesthetic definitely suits this fair-skinned beauty.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Amanda Seyfried
Amanda's gone from sweet to sultry in just a few...
Image 17 of 125 Giuliana Rancic
Back in 2005 when Giuliana was still Ms. DePandi, she showed off her girly side with bubblegum pink lipstick, rosy cheeks, and highlighted layers at a Children's Burn Foundation fundraiser.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Giuliana Rancic
Back in 2005 when Giuliana was still Ms. DePandi,... Image 18 of 125 Giuliana Rancic
The now Mrs. Rancic ditched her sugary style for a more sexed-up look at the 2012 Gracie Awards Gala with a va-va-voom red bandage dress, flirty brown curls, and smoky eyes.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Giuliana Rancic
The now Mrs. Rancic ditched her sugary style for... Image 19 of 125 Demi Lovato
In her Disney days, Demi sported dark, one-color tresses that fell in long, layered waves. Her natural look at the City of Hope Benefit Concert in 2008 had a youthful innocence that didn't foreshadow what was yet to come...or did it?
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Demi Lovato
In her Disney days, Demi sported dark, one-color...
Image 20 of 125 Demi Lovato
Post-Disney Demi has embraced the rock n’ roll image. After a stint in rehab and a new gig as a X Factor judge, Lovato spiced things up a bit with funky pink highlights and an I Dream of Jeannie ponytail at the show’s auditions in June 2012.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Demi Lovato
Post-Disney Demi has embraced the rock n’ roll image....
Image 21 of 125 Heidi Klum
Nothing says Victoria's Secret model like Heidi’s blonde bombshell waves, hoop earrings and sparkling pink moto jacket at the kick off of the Angels Across America tour in 2004.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Heidi Klum
Nothing says Victoria's Secret model like Heidi’s... Image 22 of 125 Heidi Klum
Heidi has definitely learned a few styling tips as host of Project Runway . Her chic layers, luscious lashes and chain-detailed top at the 10th anniversary of the show in 2012 are so much more fashion-forward.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time Photo: Getty Images Heidi Klum
Heidi has definitely learned a few styling tips as host...
Image 23 of 125 Miley Cyrus
From her fake and baked skin to her over-done red extensions, Miley looked anything but au naturel at the 2010 Grammy Awards.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Miley Cyrus
From her fake and baked skin to her over-done red... Image 24 of 125 Miley Cyrus
Newly-engaged Miley's bouffant bob and bold brows at the 2012 Billboard Music Awards give her a classic look to match her more mature relationship status. But even though she’s saying goodbye to being single, she's still keeping that nose ring.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Miley Cyrus
Newly-engaged Miley's bouffant bob and bold brows at... Image 25 of 125 Rooney Mara
Rooney’s cascading brunette curls and sheer top adorned with an oversized bow and lace relay her feminine fashion sense at the 2010 Youth in Revolt premiere.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Rooney Mara
Rooney’s cascading brunette curls and sheer top... Image 26 of 125 Rooney Mara
Rooney has gone to the dark side at the The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo premiere. Her new inky cut and red lips are full of naughty sex appeal.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Rooney Mara
Rooney has gone to the dark side at the The Girl with... Image 27 of 125 Jennifer Lopez
Jenny from the Block was a brunette with bouncing curls at the 1997 premiere of Anaconda. The dark lip color was a temporary blunder for the dancer-turned-singer-turned-actress.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Jennifer Lopez
Jenny from the Block was a brunette with bouncing... Image 28 of 125 Jennifer Lopez
Three marriages and twins later, J.Lo is taking a more natural approach to makeup, but she still has a weakness for sheer red carpet attire at the 2011 American Music Awards.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Jennifer Lopez
Three marriages and twins later, J.Lo is taking a... Image 29 of 125 Emma Watson
At the 2008 premier of The Tale of Despereaux , Emma is still the innocent Hermoine from the Harry Potter epic with her sideswept bangs, shoulder-length curls, and basic makeup look.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Emma Watson
At the 2008 premier of The Tale of Despereaux , Emma is... Image 30 of 125 Emma Watson
Emma shows she is all grown up at the premiere of Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 . With the end of her childhood acting career, she has opted for an edgier look with a short brunette crop and eye makeup that is both glittering and smoky.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Emma Watson
Emma shows she is all grown up at the premiere of Harry... Image 31 of 125 Katy Perry
When it comes to her hair, Katy Perry has wandered the color spectrum from blue to pink. Here she is wearing a reserved black bob with a blunt bang at the 2009 Palais des Festivals in Cannes. But her bright lip color and stand-out lashes still grab attention.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Katy Perry
When it comes to her hair, Katy Perry has wandered the... Image 32 of 125 Katy Perry
At the launch of her perfume, MEOW!, Katy has chosen a demure blonde look that suggests her days as a color junkie are through (but with a hint of blue still visible in this do we doubt it!)
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Katy Perry
At the launch of her perfume, MEOW!, Katy has chosen a... Image 33 of 125 Nicole Richie
Nicole showcased her love of headwear, highlights and tube tops at the 2002 Playstation pre-Superbowl party. Her grunge style means nothing but trouble.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Nicole Richie
Nicole showcased her love of headwear, highlights and... Image 34 of 125 Nicole Richie
Now, Nicole has come into her socialite persona and rocks a demure blonde bob with bangs at her House of Harlow 1960 holiday pop-up shop.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Nicole Richie
Now, Nicole has come into her socialite persona and... Image 35 of 125 Taylor Swift
Taylor strikes a country music chord with a head full of curls and casual makeup look at the 2006 Country Music Association Awards  all thats missing is her guitar.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Taylor Swift
Taylor strikes a country music chord with a head full... Image 36 of 125 Taylor Swift
Taylor has opted to darken her tresses, straighten her natural curls, and cut her bangs. Attending Billboard's 2011 Women in Music event she also swiped on her favorite red lipstick which fans have come to expect in her red carpet looks.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Taylor Swift
Taylor has opted to darken her tresses, straighten her... Image 37 of 125 Rihanna
Rihanna had hairstylists everywhere cutting their clients into an asymmetrical bob as seen here at the 2007 Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Rihanna
Rihanna had hairstylists everywhere cutting their clients... Image 38 of 125 Rihanna
At the 2011 London launch of her new scent, Reb'l Fleur, Rihannas new hairdo is reminiscent of the Farrah Fawcett of the 70s with a fiery fix.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Rihanna
At the 2011 London launch of her new scent, Reb'l Fleur,... Image 39 of 125 Beyoncé Knowles
These two-toned, bodacious curls are more than we can handle on Beyoncé at the 2002 Austin Powers in Goldmember premiere. She was definitely channeling the Foxy Cleopatra of the 70s.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Beyoncé Knowles
These two-toned, bodacious curls are more than we... Image 40 of 125 Beyoncé Knowles
At the 2011 launch of her fragrance, Pulse, this braided style suits the superstars on-the-go lifestyle and will be much easier to manage with a baby in tow! Beyoncé still loves to sparkle in her sequins ensemble.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Beyoncé Knowles
At the 2011 launch of her fragrance, Pulse, this... Image 41 of 125 Gwen Stefani
As a member of No Doubt, Gwen had a punk image to uphold with her mesh tank layered with a bikini top and an oversized gold chain at the 2001 VH1 Vogue Fashion Awards.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Gwen Stefani
As a member of No Doubt, Gwen had a punk image to... Image 42 of 125 Gwen Stefani
Now, Gwens business is fashion. She stays true to her rocker style with gold accents and an askew top knot hairstyle at the In the Land of Blood and Honey premiere in Los Angeles.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Gwen Stefani
Now, Gwens business is fashion. She stays true to... Image 43 of 125 Vanessa Hudgens
The teeny bopper style that Vanessa portrayed in High School Musical lives on at the Radio Disney Totally 10 Birthday Concert where she wears layered necklaces, a black-tipped mani, and long beach waves.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Vanessa Hudgens
The teeny bopper style that Vanessa portrayed in. .. Image 44 of 125 Vanessa Hudgens
We prefer Vanessa's more sophisticated look at the 2011 premiere of Iris: A Journey Into the World of Cinema by Cirque du Soleil. Her new layered bob screams bohemian chic.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Vanessa Hudgens
We prefer Vanessa's more sophisticated look at the... Image 45 of 125 Jennifer Hudson
After her American Idol debut, J.Hud still wore a head full of curls at The Actors Fund of America gala. Her heavily lined lip and dark makeup colors betray her inexperience in the spotlight.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Jennifer Hudson
After her American Idol debut, J.Hud still wore a... Image 46 of 125 Jennifer Hudson
Jennifer has lost more than a few dress sizes! Her pastel pink lips are evidence that she has gained beauty savvy. We love her straightened cascading strands at Christmas in Washington 2011.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Jennifer Hudson
Jennifer has lost more than a few dress sizes! Her... Image 47 of 125 Katie Holmes
In 2003 Katie Holmes was ahead of her time with this two-toned hairstyle, but at The Matrix Reloaded premiere she still looked like a girl missing her garage band.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Katie Holmes
In 2003 Katie Holmes was ahead of her time with this... Image 48 of 125 Katie Holmes
At a 2011 taping of the Late Show With David Letterman , Katie wears her long waves with style and has grown into her new family gal image while keeping her wholesome sex appeal.

Photo: Getty Images Katie Holmes
At a 2011 taping of the Late Show With David... Image 49 of 125 Drew Barrymore
A child star no longer, Drew embodies a look that is more hippie than chic with her headpiece and sparkling scarf at the 1999 Nickelodeon Kids’ Choice Awards.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Drew Barrymore
A child star no longer, Drew embodies a look that is... Image 50 of 125 Drew Barrymore
Drew is sporting a brazen red dye that really makes her fair features and bright eyes simmer at a 2011 benefit dinner hoted by Chanel.

Photo: Getty Images Drew Barrymore
Drew is sporting a brazen red dye that really makes... Image 51 of 125 Dakota Fanning
Dakota maintains her girlish looks at the premiere of The Secret Life of Bees in Los Angeles by wearing a barely-there makeup look.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Dakota Fanning
Dakota maintains her girlish looks at the premiere... Image 52 of 125 Dakota Fanning
At 17 years old, this child star is all grown up at the Rodarte Spring 2012 show during New York Fashion Week 2011. Dakotas blue eyes really shine next to her bright blonde strands that are super straight and cut with precision.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Dakota Fanning
At 17 years old, this child star is all grown up at... Image 53 of 125 Tyra Banks
At this 1998 signing for her book, Tyra's Beauty Inside and Out , Tyra sports a textbook bob hairstyle and very little makeup which allows her natural beauty to shine.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Tyra Banks
At this 1998 signing for her book, Tyra's Beauty Inside... Image 54 of 125 Tyra Banks
Although there is no concrete evidence that Tyra has been under the knife, her nose is looking slimmer at the 2011 Get Schooled Foundation pep rally hints. Either way we support the model moguls choice to add blunt bangs to her updated bob.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Tyra Banks
Although there is no concrete evidence that Tyra has... Image 55 of 125 Dianna Agron
When Dianna stepped into the spotlight in 2009 as a member of the Glee cast she still had the look of a high school student with her long flowing curls.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Dianna Agron
When Dianna stepped into the spotlight in 2009 as a... Image 56 of 125 Dianna Agron
Now her short cut and pompadour updo at “Trevor LIVE” has made way for a more adult image as she expands her acting career from teen television drama.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Dianna Agron
Now her short cut and pompadour updo at “Trevor... Image 57 of 125 Kristen Stewart
Kristen went blonde in 2007 at the Into the Wild premiere. Her light hair doesnt quite complement her brooding blue eyes like the brunette strands hat are peeking out at the roots.

Photo: Getty Images Kristen Stewart
Kristen went blonde in 2007 at the Into the Wild ... Image 58 of 125 Kristen Stewart
At the premiere of The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1 , Kristen has surpassed her brown locks and taken her look to darker black depths.

Photo: Getty Images Kristen Stewart
At the premiere of The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn... Image 59 of 125 Evan Rachel Wood
At the 2003 The Last Samurai premiere, Evan is stuck in the past wearing a conservative jacket and curls that mimics the style of Jackie O.

Photo: Getty Images Evan Rachel Wood
At the 2003 The Last Samurai premiere, Evan is... Image 60 of 125 Evan Rachel Wood
Evan is taking more fashion risks with her red lipstick, plummeting neckline, and short pixie coif that is reminiscent of James Deans greaser look at the 2011 Ides of March screening.
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Evan Rachel Wood
Evan is taking more fashion risks with her red... Image 61 of 125 Solange Knowles
Solanges is still living in her big sister's shadow. Her long curls and conservative purple dress at a 2007 taping of MTVs TRL are more safe than superstar.

Photo: Getty Images Solange Knowles
Solanges is still living in her big sister's... Image 62 of 125 Solange Knowles
After a drastic cut in 2009, Solange is coming into her own style. She takes fashion risks with her bold colors, chunky jewelry, pastel lips and thick natural hair and brows at the Christian Louboutin book launch
Reprinted with Permission of Hearst Communications, Inc. Originally Published: 60 Best Celebrity Makeovers of All Time
Photo: Getty Images Solange Knowles

Reese is glamorous at the 2001 Golden Globes. Her black pearls, golden ringlets and conservative dress enhance her youthful shine.

Reese is glamorous at the 2001 Golden Globes. Her... Image 64 of 125 Reese Witherspoon
The high chignon is a testament to Reese's new big girl persona at the LACMA Art + Film Gala. However she isn't afraid to show a little skin with this one shoulder ensemble.

At the 2004 MTV Movie Awards, Jessicas color scheme is very bright from her turquoise eye shadow and earrings to the pink blush and lipstick. All topped off with blonde waves that appear by sun-dyed.

Jessica has darkened her mane and lightened her makeup palette creating a more professional and poised persona at the premiere of New Years Eve .

Michelle's chocolate short cut, black beads and... Image 68 of 125 Michelle Williams
We love her pixie crop at the My Week with Marilyn screening. It allows us to admire her full rosy cheeks and sparkling eyes.

This long wavy hairstyle at the 2011 Brain Trauma Foundation Gala is more becoming for a woman of Sarah's stature. She is a knock-out with just a hint of lace to add sex appeal.

This long wavy hairstyle at the 2011 Brain... Image 71 of 125 Julia Roberts

Photo: Getty Images Julia Roberts
We loved Julia's flowing red mane that makes her eyes... Image 72 of 125 Julia Roberts
At the premiere of Fireflies in the Garden , Julia has brightened up her look with a blonde highlighted hue that is just as flattering as her previous red locks. She looks good in any hair color.

At the premiere of Fireflies in the Garden , Julia... Image 73 of 125 Kate Hudson
Whimsical is the best word to describe the fashion sense of Kate at the 2001 Screen Actors Guild Awards. Her oversized flower, waves, and sheer dress make it clear that she is the daughter of a hippie.

Whimsical is the best word to describe the fashion... Image 74 of 125 Kate Hudson
Kates golden attire matches her bright locks at the LACMA Art + Film Gala. Plus, motherhood has done wondrous things for the starlets cleavage.

Photo: Getty Images Kate Hudson
Kates golden attire matches her bright locks at the... Image 75 of 125 Gwyneth Paltrow
Gwen is attempting to pull off a vampire chic look with her rusty red lip and dark fur. But we do think she pulls off her pixie cut with class at the 1997 premiere of Hard Eight .

Gone are the dark days for Gwen. At the 2011 Emmy Awards she chose a dainty lace ensemble with straight blonde strands and a center part.

Gone are the dark days for Gwen. At the 2011 Emmy... Image 77 of 125 Kim Kardashian

We love Kims natural brows and makeup palette at... Image 78 of 125 Kim Kardashian
At the 2011 grand opening of the Kardashian Khaos store in Las Vegas, it is clear Kim is making more conservative fashion choices now that she is a businesswoman. Her use of both top and bottom falsies has become a signature makeup move.

Photo: Getty Images Kim Kardashian
At the 2011 grand opening of the Kardashian Khaos... Image 79 of 125 Lady Gaga
Although we secretly love the rock-hard leotard. Using multiple blush colors at Perez Hilton's One Night in... 2008 was one of Gagas more eccentric makeup moves.

Photo: Getty Images Lady Gaga
Although we secretly love the rock-hard leotard. Using... Image 80 of 125 Lady Gaga
Mother Monster has toned down her flamboyant style for more classic glamour wearing red lipstick, flowing blonde curls, and a lengthy black dress with over-the-top shoulder pads at the 2011 International Emmy Awards.

At the Dilemma premiere, Winona has grown out her... Image 125 of 125 John Goodman steps out looking noticeably thinner 1 / 125 Back to Gallery It's no secret that one of John Goodman's more noticeable features was his size.
And now it's the lack thereof.
Goodman revealed his dramatic weight loss this week when he stepped out on the red carpet during the "Trumbo" movie premiere in London last night.
He once told David Letterman he was pushing 400 pounds at one point and that staying in shape was an ongoing battle.
"I'm not going to look like Paris Hilton or anything like that. It's going to be an ongoing process for the rest of my life," Goodman told Letterman .
Kudos to you, John.
